owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MembershipERC721ProxyCreated(address,str.notice: New proxy created via this factory

buildMembershipERC721Proxy(string,string.notice: Builds a new membership proxy contract. Can be called by contract owner only.

getBeacon().notice: Returns the address for the upgradeable beacon for this factory

getImplementation().notice: Returns the address for the underlying implementation contract for this factory

proxyWasCreatedByFactory(address).notice: Returns true if a proxy was created by this factory, false otherwise

renounceOwnership().notice: Overrides the renounceOwnership function from Ownable. Always reverts.
